global.name: global
global.justification: Total monthly infrastructure budget for production environment. Includes VPC networking ($1000), compute resources ($2500), databases ($1000), and monitoring ($500).

module.vpc.name: module.vpc
module.vpc.justification: Production VPC with 3 NAT Gateways ($135 each), VPN Gateway ($72), and data transfer costs. Based on 6-month average.

module.compute.name: module.compute
module.compute.justification: Auto-scaling EC2 fleet for web tier. Variance allows for traffic spikes and auto-scaling events. Includes 10x t3.large instances baseline.

module.database.name: module.database
module.database.justification: RDS PostgreSQL db.r5.xlarge with Multi-AZ. Storage costs fixed at 500GB. Low variance expected due to reserved capacity.

module.monitoring.name: module.monitoring
module.monitoring.justification: CloudWatch metrics, logs, and alarms. Higher variance due to log volume fluctuation with traffic patterns.

NAT Gateway.name: NAT Gateway
NAT Gateway.justification: 3x NAT Gateways at $135/month each. Cost is fixed per gateway.

RDS.name: RDS
RDS.justification: Reserved instance pricing locked in for 12 months.
